*.la
*.lai

*.so.*

*.dylib

*.qmake.cache

*.pro.user

*creator.user*

# Qt-specific cache and temporary files

*.qmlc
*.jsc
*.pro.user*

# Build directories
*build-*/

# Keep generated files that are critical for running
!ui_*.h
!moc_*.cpp
!moc_*.h
!qrc_*.cpp

# Allow prebuilt binaries if necessary
!*.exe
